name: Unraveling Angel
storyline:
In his last year of college, the protagonist's attendance faltered, and with it fell his grades.
Rather than going to his classes he was caught loitering on campus daily.
In order to rectify this he was offered a chance to partake in the "Coward's Committee".

On arriving he found it dead.
Save for the supervisor, no one else bothered to show up.

With little else left to bide time, he accepted this outcome, thinking he could use it to learn more about the only people who ever mattered to him.
summary:
Unraveling Angel is a choice-based adult visual novel following a bisexual male protagonist in a city that struggles to live and breathe. As the player you make choices that lead him into the arms of one the three love interests; Veronika, Matt and Vice.
Pick the path he follows but know that there's only one universal truth. Behind every door lies a world of hurt, including the correct one.
